caption.p: Relative DNA methylation levels in all populations of D. angustifolia. I—fragments present in both profiles (1,1), unmethylated state; II—fragments were present only with EcoRI/HpaII (1,0), hemi-methylation of external cytosine; III—fragments were present only with EcoRI/MspI (0,1), full-methylation of internal cytosine; IV—fragments were absent with both profile (0,0), uninformative site.
